func.title: GetEffect

param.name: name
param.desc: Name of the effect without preceding 'Fx'. You can use '*' and '?' wildcards.

param.name: target
param.desc: Target object in which to access effects. If nil, the global effects are accessed.

param.name: index
param.desc: Effect index. With name specified and multiple matches for the search this will give you the indicated effect from the list of results.

param.name: max_priority
param.desc: If not 0, only those effects are counted which have the specified priority or lower.

func.desc: Retrieves a certain effect. If an effect cannot be found the return value is nil.

example.text: Removes all magic effects from all objects and the global list.
